data.title: Congressman Brad Sherman Sends Letter to Metro’s Board — Calls for Transparency on the Sepulveda Transit Corridor Project — Bel
data.meta_description: Dear Bel-Air Resident:  For years Congressman Brad Sherman has been a good friend of the Bel-Air community.  As of November 8th, he was elected to be our congressman. data.text:
Dear Bel-Air Resident:

For years Congressman Brad Sherman has been a good friend of the Bel-Air community. As of November 8th, he was elected to be our congressman.

Brad knows of Bel-Air's opposition to Metro's poorly thought out consideration of building a mind boggling expensive and potentially dangerous subway under our community. Brad is hitting the ground running in his representation of our community as evidenced by the attached letter he sent to Metro this week.

The Bel-Air Association looks forward to working closely with our new congressman, Brad Sherman!

Best,

Jamie Meyer, President Bel-Air Association
